appendContent.description: Content to put at the top of the exported sheet. An array of ExcelRow objects, see [Extra Content section](./excel-export-extra-content/).

prependContent.description: Content to put at the bottom of the exported sheet. An array of ExcelRow objects, see [Extra Content section](./excel-export-extra-content/).

meta.description: Properties available on the `ExcelHeaderFooter` interface. At least one of header or footer is required or both.

header.description: An array of maximum 3 items (`Left`, `Center`, `Right`), containing header configurations.

footer.description: An array of maximum 3 items (`Left`, `Center`, `Right`), containing footer configurations.
